name: 3M Company
summary: 3M Company is a multinational conglomerate corporation that produces a wide array of branded products. Its operations are organized into three business segments: Safety & Industrial, Transportation & Electronics, and Consumer. The company spun off its healthcare business as Solventum Corporation in 2024. The company is known for its innovation in materials science and its diverse product portfolio, which includes adhesives, abrasives, personal protective equipment, and medical supplies.
